description:
My place is close to Theater District, Columbus Circle,  Intrepid Sea, Air & Space Museum, Riverside Park, Hell's Kitchen, Radio City, Rockefeller Center. You’ll love my place because of the location. My place is good for couples, families (with kids), big groups, and furry friends (pets). Nearby Subways: ACE, 1, NQR.

Comfy and cozy 2 bedroom. One large master with a queen bed, and a smaller room with a lofted double bed.

Guests will have access to the entire apartment. Kitchen is stocked with cookware and a Keurig

We live in the NYC area and are available to help in case of an Emergency.

Hells Kitchen is loaded with restaurants and bars. There are over 350+ places that will deliver to the apartment.

The apartment is within walking distance to all of mid-town. You may also use (ACE, 1, NQR) and 50th street cross-town bus all located on our street.
name: Comfy Midtown 2BR
review:
Everything with Steven was great. The location of the apartment is just awesome. You are a close walk away from Time Square and Broadway. Of course Hells Kitchen is also close by where you can get some awesome food.

Communication was super easy!!!!

Was glad that I could experience this part of Manhattan.
